ygData.subject: Re: Secret Code (OOC)
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate the acronyms too.  I m not in the U.S. Military, here.  I have no idea what a RTS is, real time strategy?  I have probably heard the definition of it,
ygData.messageBody:
I hate the acronyms too. I'm not in the U.S. Military, here. I have no
idea what a RTS is, real time strategy? I have probably heard the
definition of it, and forgotten. If a salesman pitches me his products in a
lingo that I don't understand, it is a bad sales pitch, and I won't be
buying anything from him. He lost a sale. At worse, the language barrier
might get either of us killed.

SoWing over to RV from FP because a HRU is going to TD me a BBC for an ABC
and I have to have my NBC and CBS handy. Bah! Speak english for crying out
loud! I spend enough time learning other features of the game without
having to memorize vocabulary lists at night.


Roop
